item.title: Demystifying Continuous Integration, Delivery, and Deployment
item.description: This Calm.io blog recap was originally written by me and posted on December 28, 2015 at http://calm.io/2015/12/28/demystifying-continuous-integration-delivery-and-deployment/ and slightly enhanced on February 18, 2018.
